title: VR-Based Elementary Science Inquiry Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Enables VR experiences via smartphones in school-based limited-technology environments, with prior parental agreement.

learning_goals: Students can quantitatively describe the relative sizes and distances of planets in the solar system using VR technology.
Learners can connect natural phenomena observed in VR environments (e.g., volcanic eruptions) to scientific principles and write inquiry reports.
Students can collaborate in groups of three to design VR-based science projects and create presentation materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
